nodes.text: The Yylti Corporation was a company that operated during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. In 21 BBY, Senator Padmé Amidala of the Galactic Senate sought to assemble a civilian fleet to assist in the relief of the world of Lanteeb from the control of Confederacy of Independent Systems, and the Yylti Corporations was one of a list of organizations that she contacted in an attempt to secure their support.
